page.title: 16SUPERNATURAL
page.content:
SUPERNATURAL STANTON HARCOURT
Stanton Harcourt Manor House has a {ghost. }Her name is{Alice,}she had an affair with a Priest who lived in Popes Tower. When the affair was discovered he was sacked and she was mortified, and committed suicide in one of the Manor's Stew Ponds, known ever since as the {Lady Pool.
In 196O photographs were being taken of the Manor for Country Life magazine and when the photographs were developed the photographer asked Lord Harcourt 'Who is the lady in the photograph, I cannot remember her being there when I took the photograph?' It was, of course, Alice and the photograph is in the possession of Lord Harcourt's daughter who now lives at the Manor House.
